rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entry with minimal design elements and functional storage space.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living area integrated with the dining space, featuring large windows for natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen and living room, designed to accommodate a family table.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen area with modern amenities on a tight budget, including floor-to-ceiling windows for natural lighting.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony. Vastu compliant, facing east or north.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom for the second occupant, featuring built-in storage and floor-to-ceiling windows, with access to an internal balcony area.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Small guest bathroom attached to the corridor, designed to be practical and space-efficient.
